rooms.name: Entrance Hallway & Foyer
rooms.description: Serves as the initial space leading to living areas. Designed with natural lighting through large glass doors and ventilation via a skylight.

rooms.name: Lobby & Waiting Area
rooms.description: Welcoming area for visitors, featuring eco-friendly bamboo flooring and wall planters to maintain indoor air quality.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Combo
rooms.description: Open-plan space with abundant natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows. Features an integrated dining area and eco-friendly wooden furniture.

rooms.name: Studio Bedroom
rooms.description: Multi-functional room serving as bedroom and study area, equipped with energy-efficient lighting and smart ventilation systems.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact kitchen design optimized for space. Uses sustainable materials and includes an integrated herb garden to promote natural ventilation and fresh air.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Small yet functional bathroom with eco-friendly fixtures and a skylight for enhanced natural lighting.

openings.description: Large glass door to welcome abundant natural light.
Floor-to-ceiling window designed for optimal sunlight and cross ventilation.
Provides outdoor space, natural light access and facilitates cross-ventilation.
Doorway connecting to the interior patio garden that integrates with the living area for additional ventilation.

note: This design considers eco-friendly materials and energy-efficient systems. Local building norms and Vastu principles have been integrated by orienting major openings towards the north and east, ensuring natural light and balanced airflow throughout the penthouse studio apartment.
